name: Balsamic vinaigrette
description: Mix together ingredients in a mason jar and leave overnight.

name: Good Ass Salad
description: Cut 'em, throw 'em in, drown it in balsamic vinaigrette (see other recipe). Make vinaigrette and feta the day before for ease :). source

name: Roast Sweet Potato
description: Poke 'em with a fork, line a baking tray, bake 'em at 220C for 40-50 minutes.

name: Vegan feta
description: Mix the marinade together in a mason jar, throw in the block of tofu, toss the mason jar (physically, not in the bin), leave overnight to marinade. source
ingredients: Block of firm tofu, pressed and cubed/crumbled
